entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
